latest_revision.text:
This page overviews the administrative status of the wiki.  If you have a request or suggestion please use the discussion page to present your topic.  The admins will respond as soon as possible and research your issue.

==Features and Extensions==
*Currently we are using the following extensions:
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:RSS#Source '''RSS'''] to display RSS feeds
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:ReCAPTCHA ReCAPTCHA] for spam and editing control
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:User_Merge_and_Delete User Merge and Delete] for administration
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SyntaxHighlight_GeSHi GeSHi Syntax Highlighting] for source code highlighting
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Google_Analytics_Integration Google Analytics] for usage tracking
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Google_Maps Google Maps] adds ability to embed Google maps in an article
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Ajax_Show_Editors Ajax_Show_Editors] for UI enhancement

*And the following hacks/tweaks:
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Short_URL '''Short URLs'''] for clean URLs
**CSS removal of the [[Main Page]] title [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Configuration_tips_and_tricks#Removing_Main_Page_Title]

==Revoked Modifications and Extensions==
*[http://ciarang.com/wiki/page/WPMW '''AuthWP'''] for WordPress-MediaWiki single sign on
**(Issues with account update code prevented mediawiki from changing passwords and creating accounts in the WP database.)

==Requested Modifications==
*Forum
**[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:AWC%27s_Forum AWC Forum]
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:AjaxRatingScript Ajax Rating Script] for UI enhancement and feedback
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Flickr Flickr] for bandwidth savings and user experience
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:CategoryTree CategoryTree] for UI enhancement
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:IM_Status IM Status] for user experience
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:JQuery_Tab_Container Tabs] for UI enhancement
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:IRC_Chat IRC Chat] for user experience
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GroupPortal Group Portal] for user experience and management
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SidebarEx SidebarEx] for user experience and management
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Calendar_%28Kenyu73%29 Calendar] for UI enhancement
*[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:MobileSkin Mobile Skin] for UI enhancement
